global-traits.title: Edit Global Traits
global-traits.desc: The prompt will be append into the query when you skid your homework to personalize the response.
global-traits.placeholder: You're a smart assistant that helps the user with the homework.

preview.drag-tip: You can drag or paste your files to this panel.
preview.drag-tip-mobile: Tap a card to zoom in. Swipe left or right to review everything.
preview.no-files: No files yet. Upload or take a photo to begin.
preview.title: Preview
preview.tip: Hint: double click to focus image on solution area, single click to preview in full screen

dialog.title: Rename File
dialog.desc: Please enter the new name for the file

scan-page.title: Scan your homework
scan-page.tip: We never upload without your action.

mobile.empty: Add a photo or PDF to get started.
mobile.hint-ready: You're ready to scan. Tap “Let's Skid” when you're set.
mobile.hint-pdf: Enable a Gemini source in Settings to allow PDF uploads.

post-processing.title: Still processing...
post-processing.description: Your image was still post-processing. Please wait for a while.

no-model.title: Model required
no-model.description: Please choose a model for {{provider}} in Settings before scanning.

no-key.title: You're almost there
no-key.description: Please set an API key for {{provider}} in Settings.

all-processed.title: All images processed
all-processed.description: There are no pending or failed images to scan.

working.title: Working...
working.description: Sending {{count}} file(s) to your AI sources...

error.title: An unexpected error occurred
error.description: Something went wrong during the process. Please check the console.

no-source.title: No AI sources configured
no-source.description: Enable at least one AI provider with an API key in Settings before scanning.

unsupported-file.title: Unsupported file type
unsupported-file.description: Your file with mime type {{mimeType}} is currently not supported by SkidHomework.

pdf-blocked.title: PDF uploads disabled
pdf-blocked.description: Enable a Gemini source to process PDF files.

processing-failed.answer: Please check the console for errors and try again.

errors.parsing-failed: Failed to parse the AI response.

chat-page.title: SkidHomework Chat
chat-page.subtitle: Discuss problems with your configured models.

history.title: History
history.empty: No chats yet. Start a conversation.

conversation.empty: Select a chat or start a new one to begin.

composer.placeholder: Ask a question or paste a problem...
composer.aigc-disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Verify important information.

errors.no-source: Please enable at least one source with an API key in Settings.
errors.missing-key: {{provider}} needs an API key before you can chat.
errors.no-model: Please set a model name before chatting.
errors.unsupported: The selected model does not support conversations.

solutions.analyzing: Analyzing... extracting problems and solutions from your images.
solutions.idle: No solutions yet. Add images and click "Let's Skid" to see results here.
solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.gesture-hint: Swipe left or right to switch problems.

status.success: No problems were detected for this image.
status.failed: Failed to process this image. Please try again.

solutions.focus-region-aria: Solutions keyboard focus region (Tab/Shift+Tab for problems, Space/Shift+Space for images)

empty.title: Nothing to export
empty.description: Run a scan and wait for results before exporting.

error.title: Export failed
error.description: Something went wrong while creating the markdown file.

upload-area.upload-tip: Images are supported. PDFs require an active Gemini source.

camera-tip.title: Taking photos on different devices
camera-tip.intro: The <takePhoto>Take Photo</takePhoto> button uses the browser's native camera picker (<capture>capture="environment"</capture>). On phones, it opens the camera directly. On desktops, it usually falls back to the file chooser.
tips: Prefer natural light and avoid glare.
Fill the frame with the problem. Keep text sharp.
One question per shot yields better recognition.

upload-area.pdf-disabled: PDF uploads are available only when a Gemini source is enabled.

adb.screenshot-hint: Capture a screenshot from a connected Android device via ADB (WebUSB)

toasts.webusb-not-supported: WebUSB is not supported in this browser.

tooltip.prefix: How to import into SkidHomework? Visit

api-credentials.title: API Credentials
api-credentials.desc: Store API keys locally for each AI provider. They never leave your browser.
api-credentials.label: API Key

name.label: Source name
name.placeholder: Friendly name shown in the app

sources.title: AI Sources
sources.desc: Manage enabled AI providers and choose which one to configure.

remove.label: Remove source
remove.error: Keep at least one AI source.

dialog.title: Share AI Source
dialog.desc: Scan the QR code or copy the link below. Treat this URL like a password.

appearance.title: Appearance & Language
appearance.desc: Choose how SkidHomework looks and which language it uses.

theme.label: Theme
theme.desc: Use the system preference or pick a fixed mode.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard shortcuts
shortcuts.desc: Customize the keys used for common actions. Leave blank to disable a shortcut.

manual.invalid: Enter a valid shortcut using modifier keys plus a key.

upload.label: Upload files
upload.description: Opens the file picker for selecting images or PDFs.

camera.label: Take photo
camera.description: Launches the device camera to capture homework.

adb-screenshot.label: ADB screenshot
adb-screenshot.description: Capture the connected Android device's screen via ADB.

start-scan.label: Start scan
start-scan.description: Sends all pending items to your AI sources.

clear-all.label: Clear all
clear-all.description: Removes every uploaded item and solution.

open-settings.label: Open settings
open-settings.description: Opens this settings page from anywhere in the app.

open-chat.label: Open chat
open-chat.description: Jump straight to the chat workspace.

open-global-traits-editor.label: Open Global Traits Editor
open-global-traits-editor.description: Open the editor dialog to edit global traits (prompt)

model.title: Model Configuration
model.desc: Choose or type the model name used for requests.

manual.title: Custom model
manual.desc: Enter a model name manually if it is not listed.

fetch.error: Failed to fetch models for {{provider}}. Check your API key or base URL.

thinking.title: Thinking Settings
thinking.desc: Adjust advanced thinking parameters for supported providers.

traits.title: System Prompt (Traits)
traits.desc: Define the assistant's persona or extra instructions.
traits.placeholder: e.g., You are a helpful assistant that speaks in a friendly and professional tone.

poll-interval.title: Polling interval (ms)
poll-interval.desc: How long to wait between response status checks.

poll-timeout.title: Polling timeout (ms)
poll-timeout.desc: Maximum time to wait for a response before failing.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.desc: Extras that affect uploads and the interface.

custom-base-url.title: Custom API base URL
custom-base-url.helper: Leave blank to use the default endpoint for {{provider}}.

mode.steps: Only show hits when I need

init-page.intro: Prefer Khan Academy–style self-study but still get stuck with endless assignments? SkidHomework runs locally, respects your privacy, and helps you focus on learning instead of busywork.

features.telemetry: No telemetry or spammy calls. Just the Gemini API.
features.camera: Snap homework and get step-by-step help.
features.setup: Fast setup — paste your Gemini API key and go.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.base-url-helper: Leave blank to use the default endpoint for {{provider}}.

form.api-hint: Get an API key at <link>Google AI Studio</link>.
form.storage-note: We store your key locally using encrypted browser storage and never send it to our servers.
form.api-hint-openai: Get an API key at <link>OpenAI Dashboard</link>.

footer.notice: Licensed under GPLv3, created by cubewhy.

error.title: Error
error.parse-failed: Failed to parse configuration. The link might be broken.

success.title: You're all set!
success.description: The AI model {{name}} has been successfully imported.

confirm.title: Import AI Model
confirm.description: Do you want to add this configuration to your settings?

alert.title: Security Check
alert.description: Only import configurations from sources you trust. Otherwise it may cause a privacy leak. Use at your own risk.

no-problem.title: Select a problem first
no-problem.description: Choose a problem before starting a chat.

no-source.title: No model available
no-source.description: Configure an AI source with an API key in Settings to chat.

context.intro: The learner is reviewing the following work:

prefill.intro: I'd like help understanding this problem.
prefill.outro: Can you walk me through it step by step?

improve-dialog.title: Improve the Solution
improve-dialog.description: Generate a more detailed solution using the current solution and your prompt.

no-key.title: You're almost there
no-key.description: Please set an API key for {{provider}} in Settings to continue.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: Improving your solution with AI...Please wait for a while...

failed.title: Failed to improve your solution
failed.parse: Failed to parse response, see the developer tools for more details.

no-source.title: No AI sources
no-source.description: Enable at least one AI provider in Settings before improving a solution.

inspect-dialog.title: Inspect Details
inspect-dialog.desc: Review the AI generated Markdown content.
